title: Bridal Carry - Redrikki - Star Wars Prequel Trilogy [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1

Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Padmé Amidala/Anakin Skywalker
Characters: Padmé Amidala, Anakin Skywalker

Summary:

On Naboo, it’s tradition for the groom to carry the bride to their marriage bed. With Anakin’s new prosthetic, it’s more difficult than it sounds.

title: Instantaneous
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2v5ad3N

by idrilhadhafang

Poe Dameron is a TIE pilot, raised in the First Order for the majority of his life. When Kylo Ren meets him, he can’t deny an instant fascination — and the later desire for the pilot that unfolds.

Words: 332, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

summary: SDCC 2018: Hasbro Reveals New Star Wars Figures And Reissues Some Oldies
title: SDCC 2018: Hasbro Reveals New Star Wars Figures And Reissues Some Oldies
body:
SDCC 2018: Hasbro Reveals New Star Wars Figures And Reissues Some Oldies

Hasbro is a toy company that has licenses of key franchises including Marvel, My Little Pony, and Transformers.  During San Diego Comic Con, they held a panel that covered their new slate of Star Wars action figures.

For the more basic Forcelink line of 3.75” limited articulation toys, they will put out Tobias Beckett, Rio Durant, Han Solo Mudtrooper, Val, L3-37, and Quay Tolsite from Solo: A…

View On WordPress

blog.name: ao3feed-starwars
blog.title: Star Wars AO3 Feed
blog.description:
An AO3 Feed for the Star Wars - All Media Types tag.

Icon from the Star Wars App.

title: Storm Shadows
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LxMaVo

by unpossible

She’d been young and stupid. Young, stupid and truly alone for the first time.

Four months since she’d been abandoned by Saw Gerrera. Jyn had been hungry for contact but terrified by the idea of it, the risk. The stranger had seemed a fairly safe person to think about, in an abstract it’ll-never-happen sort of way.

Then came the storm, and an offer of shelter.

Words: 5442, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Storm Shadows

  • Fandoms: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story (2016)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Jyn Erso, Cassian Andor, Bodhi Rook, Baze Malbus, Chirrut Îmwe, Original Female Character(s)
  • Relationships: Cassian Andor/Jyn Erso
  • Additional Tags: Pre-Canon, Alternate Universe - Everyone Lives/Nobody Dies


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LxMaVo

summary: Legends of the Hydian Way - The Old Republic: Fatal Alliance
title: Legends of the Hydian Way - The Old Republic: Fatal Alliance
body:
Legends of the Hydian Way – The Old Republic: Fatal Alliance

The Old Republic setting provides a unique opportunity for Star Wars storytelling. Set against the backdrop of a cold war between Jedi/Republic and the Sith, authors can play both sides off of the other in a time of tenuous peace. Most other times in Legends the Jedi and the Sith are aware of one another pretty much go down like Mace Windu marching on Palpatine’s office. In order words, this is…

View On WordPress

summary: Legends of the Hydian Way - The Old Republic: Annihilation
title: Legends of the Hydian Way - The Old Republic: Annihilation
body:
Legends of the Hydian Way – The Old Republic: Annihilation

We come full circle in The Old Republic this week, ending as we began five weeks ago with a novel by Drew Karpyshyn. Now, if you’ve read my review of Revan you may think that’s a bad sign considering my thoughts on that one but honestly, I tend to really like Karpyshyn’s work, so let’s see how we fare with The Old Republic: Annihilation.

Welcome to Legends of the Hydian Way, the chronicle of my…

View On WordPress

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

blog.name: frikiskrew
blog.title: FrikisKrew: de lo friki a lo freak en dosis diarias
blog.description:
De lo friki a lo freak, entretenimiento, memes, gifs y chorradas a dolor. Entra hay cientos de posts!
SFW depending on how sneaky you are

title: „Distracted Boyfriend“-Meme: Neue „Star Wars“-Version des Kultbildes
body:
Das „Distracted Boyfriend“-Meme erfreut sich noch immer großer Beliebtheit. Nun gibt es eine Star-Wars-Version des Kultbildes um den „abgelenkten Freund“ – und die erobert derzeit das Netz!

Yeah, it was a pretty great comic con! Til next year! •• ••• •• Photo by @wasted_fett Leia is @jujukitty2323 , Han is @griffincostumes #starwars #starwarscosplay #hansolo #harrisonford #aldenehrenreich #qira #qiracosplay #sdcc #sandeigocomiccon #princessleia #leiaorgana #cosplay #cosplayer #carriefisher #soloastarwarsstory #anewhope

A post shared by Alex (@socalcostumes) on Jul 22, 2018 at 10:53pm PDT

„Yeah, es war eine tolle Comic-Con! Bis zum nächsten Jahr!“

Manche Memes gehen einfach nicht unter. Das Meme vom abgelenkten Freund gehört definitiv dazu. Das Bild zeigt einen Mann, der einer attraktiven Frau hinterherschaut. Doch das bemerkt seine Freundin, mit der er eigentlich unterwegs ist – ihr schockiert-wütender Blick spricht Bände.

Das Meme lässt sich in unzähligen Konstellationen einsetzen. Auch in die Kultsaga „Star Wars“, wie jetzt ein Teilnehmer-Trio bei der Comic-Con-Messe in San Diego mit einer witzigen Aktion gezeigt hat. Sie haben das Meme kurzerhand mit Han Solo, Leia und Qi’ra nachgestellt.

Some friends from @SGTemplePrime at SDCC this weekend!!!! pic.twitter.com/bmrLx1T5VH

— Kesseltoyrun (@thekesseltoyrun) July 23, 2018

„Einige Freunde von @SGTemplePrime bei der SDCC dieses Wochenende!!!!“

Durch einen Re-Tweet der Gruppe Kesseltoyrun, die Star-Wars-Weihnachten für Kinder in Krankenhäusern organisiert, wurde das Ergebnis im ganzen Netz bekannt: Über 11.000 Retweets und 36.000 Likes gab es innerhalb weniger Tage.

Tiny Trump Meme – Der US-Präsident als Baby

Das ursprüngliche Meme erfreute sich insbesondere in den Sommermonaten 2017 großer Beliebtheit. Hier zwei Beispiele der damaligen Versionen:

pic.twitter.com/DCjtlfb2yM

— Nate Silver (@NateSilver538) August 25, 2017

In dieser Abwandlung schaut ein „Medien-Unternehmen“ einem „Video“ nach, während „Inhalt mit Texten“ sich betrogen fühlt.

pic.twitter.com/UeIeiQnFrt

— Omar Essam Lhc (@OmarEssamLhc) August 19, 2017

Hier liebäugelt „die Jugend“ mit dem „Sozialismus“, während der „Kapitalismus“ empört dreinschaut.

reblog.comment:
Das „Distracted Boyfriend“-Meme erfreut sich noch immer großer Beliebtheit. Nun gibt es eine Star-Wars-Version des Kultbildes um den „abgelenkten Freund“ – und die erobert derzeit das Netz!

Yeah, it was a pretty great comic con! Til next year! •• ••• •• Photo by @wasted_fett Leia is @jujukitty2323 , Han is @griffincostumes #starwars #starwarscosplay #hansolo #harrisonford #aldenehrenreich #qira #qiracosplay #sdcc #sandeigocomiccon #princessleia #leiaorgana #cosplay #cosplayer #carriefisher #soloastarwarsstory #anewhope

A post shared by Alex (@socalcostumes) on Jul 22, 2018 at 10:53pm PDT

„Yeah, es war eine tolle Comic-Con! Bis zum nächsten Jahr!“

Manche Memes gehen einfach nicht unter. Das Meme vom abgelenkten Freund gehört definitiv dazu. Das Bild zeigt einen Mann, der einer attraktiven Frau hinterherschaut. Doch das bemerkt seine Freundin, mit der er eigentlich unterwegs ist – ihr schockiert-wütender Blick spricht Bände.

Das Meme lässt sich in unzähligen Konstellationen einsetzen. Auch in die Kultsaga „Star Wars“, wie jetzt ein Teilnehmer-Trio bei der Comic-Con-Messe in San Diego mit einer witzigen Aktion gezeigt hat. Sie haben das Meme kurzerhand mit Han Solo, Leia und Qi’ra nachgestellt.

blog.name: ao3feed-starwars
blog.title: Star Wars AO3 Feed
blog.description:
An AO3 Feed for the Star Wars - All Media Types tag.

Icon from the Star Wars App.

title: Harem of the Sith
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uPeUiW

by I_Gave_You_Fair_Warning

So many Sith exist, and they all have access to one fancy safehouse, with its pampered bed slave. Loyal, discrete, but not deemed quite powerful enough to apprentice, Obi-Wan has made the best of his circumstances and takes considerable pleasure wherever he can find it.

Fleeing in the wake of a failed takeover & Order 66, disowned by Padmé and divorced, Anakin has no idea what he’s just gotten himself into.

Words: 1913, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Prequel Trilogy, Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death, Rape/Non-Con
  • Categories: F/M, M/M, Multi, Other
  • Characters: Anakin Skywalker | Darth Vader, Obi-Wan Kenobi, many others
  • Relationships: Obi-Wan Kenobi/Darth Maul, Obi-Wan Kenobi/ ALL the Darksiders, Qui-Gon Jinn & Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn & Anakin Skywalker
  • Additional Tags: Everyone Starts Out Alive, Dark Obi-Wan Kenobi, Sith AU, Suitless Vader, Sex Slave Obi-Wan, Graphic Dubcon, Non-Graphic Noncon, Everyone Is Miserable But Obi-Wan’s Determined to Have Sex Along the Way, Anakin was Qui-Gon’s Padawan, Explicit Sexual Content, No underage, But Implied Past Elements of Grooming, No Rule of Two, So Many Many Sith


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uPeUiW
